Class RubberbandPanel 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.awt.Component
           |
           +----java.awt.Container
                   |
                   +----com.sun.java.swing.JComponent
                           |
                           +----RubberbandPanel
public abstract class RubberbandPanel
extends JComponent
An extension of JComponent which is fitted with a Rubberband. Handling of mouse events is automatically handled for rubberbanding.

Clients may set or get the Rubberband at any time.

See Also:
